backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining a Reservation type with 7 fields and a submitReservation function that adds reservations to a List and returns true.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting 5 completed features related to Menu page creation, routing, navigation links, and menu item image rendering with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 11 frontend files describing components for routing, hero section, menu highlights, reservation form, footer, gallery, full menu page, header navigation, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, accent, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, title 'The Glass Box Website', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component using TanStack Router to define routes for home (/), menu (/menu), and gallery (/gallery) with a shared Layout component containing Header and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with 4-column grid layout displaying brand info, contact details with icons, quick links (Menu, Reservations, Gallery), services list, social media links, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Gallery page component displaying 6 restaurant images in a responsive grid with hover effects, hero section, and call-to-action for reservations.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header component with The Glass Box branding, desktop and mobile navigation for Home/Menu/Gallery routes with active state styling, and hamburger menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with full-screen background image, restaurant rating badge, headline text, CTA buttons for reservations and online ordering, and an animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Menu.tsx: Full menu page component displaying categorized menu items (Appetizers, Main Course, Desserts, Beverages) in a grid layout with images, descriptions, and prices for each dish.
frontend/src/components/MenuHighlights.t: Menu highlights section showcasing 8 popular dishes in a responsive grid with hover effects and an 'All You Can Eat' badge at the bottom.
Reservation form component with input fields for customer details (name, phone, email, date, time, guests, requests), contact information card, and success/loading states using the useSubmitReservation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient configuration with delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React Query mutation hook for submitting restaurant reservations to the backend actor, with automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Playfair Display and Inter), configures Tailwind CSS layers, and defines CSS custom properties for a luxury dark theme with black, charcoal, and gold color scheme using OKLCH color space. Includes glassmorphism utility classes and typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (gold, charcoal), typography (Playfair Display, Inter), animations (accordion), spacing utilities, and integrating plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the development of The Glass Box restaurant website, documenting architectural decisions, existing features (hero section, menu highlights, reservation form), required food/drink images, and the luxury glass aesthetic design theme.
